item.title: Slow Queue Processing
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Slowness in Queue Processing at 12:30 PM UTC

Monitoring ongoing as system recovers from slowness in queue processing. We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Summary: Our system experienced slowness in queue processing at 12:30 PM UTC, and we are currently monitoring the situation while it recovers. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Feb 29, 10:19 PST
Monitoring - Greetings All,

This is to bring you to the knowledge that we have identified slowness in Queue processing around 12:30 PM UTC.
Our system are currently recovering it by itself. Meanwhile, we will be monitoring it till the system has fully recovered.

We apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused.

Thanks for your understanding.

Kind Regards,
Reltio

item.title: Reltio workflow service degradation
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Reltio Workflow Service Degradation

Summary: The Reltio Workflow Service experienced a partial degradation in the 361.reltio.com environment, but the issue has been resolved. The root cause is being investigated.

Jan 5, 04:33 PST
Resolved - Greetings All,

At approximately 4th January at 10:30 p.m. PST, the Reltio Workflow Service experienced a partial degradation limited to the 361.reltio.com environment. Our teams worked on resolving the issue.

The issue is now resolved as of 5th January at 3:30 a.m. PST. We are currently working on the retrospective and investigating the root cause of the degradation.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you.

item.title: The Reltio Workflow Service Experienced A Partial Degradation
item.content:encoded:
Jan 4, 10:00 PST
Resolved - Greetings All,

At approximately 1:00 pm EST, the Reltio Workflow Service experienced a partial degradation limited to the 361.reltio.com environment. Shortly after that, our teams assembled and worked on resolving the issue.

The issue is now resolved as of 3:10 pm EST. We are currently working on the retrospective and investigating the root cause of the degradation.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you or your team. Please log in a support ticket if you have any questions.

Best Regards,
Reltio

item.title: Reltio AWS US HIPAA Cloud Maintenance Notification-10/21, 1 AM PDT (30 Minutes)
item.content:encoded:
Oct 21, 01:30 PDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 21, 01:00 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 16, 14:09 PDT
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Oct 9, 16:36 PDT
Scheduled - As part of our planned maintenance, the Reltio Technical Operations Team will be performing an upgrade of the Reltio Cloud Kubernetes Cluster routing service. This upgrade will require a 30 minutes of full tenant downtime only for the tenants located in Reltio US AWS HIPAA Cloud.

This upgrade will take place on Saturday October 21 2023, and will start at 1 AM PDT (4 AM ET).
There is no action you need to take before or after these upgrades.

Please see the full details below.
What: Upgrade of Reltio Cloud Kubernetes Cluster routing service
When: Saturday October 21 2023, and will start at 1 AM PDT (4 AM ET)

Where: This maintenance will only impact tenants on the next environments in Reltio US AWS HIPAA Cloud:
prod-h360.reltio.com
test-h360.reltio.com
dev-h360.reltio.com
Estimated Duration: 30 minutes on the date mentioned.

Impact: Reltio Connected Data Platform will be unavailable for any operations during the entire period of maintenance window

Why: This upgrade will improve the stability of the Reltio API and UI connectivity and prevent any possible increase in the latency on that layer.

Who is affected: All users and 3rd-party services using Reltio API and UI in any of the 3 environments mentioned above.

Action: There is no action you need to take before or after these upgrades.

Upon completion of the upgrade, a notification will be sent via the Reltio Status page. Please register on the Reltio Status page to subscribe for this and future notifications of system status.
Please reach out to Reltio Support with any questions.

item.title: Salesforce Connector Maintenance on 27 August 2023 (Sunday) 10.00 pm PST
item.content:encoded:
Aug 27, 10:31 PDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Aug 27, 10:00 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 25, 11:11 PDT
Scheduled - Reltio Technical Operations Team will be performing maintenance of the Salesforce Connector on 27 August 2023 10.00 pm PST (Sunday)/ 5:00 am, 28 August 2023 GMT.

Below are the details and impact of this maintenance:

What:
Salesforce Connector database will be upgraded

When:
27 August 2023 10.00 pm PST (Sunday)/ 5:00 am, 28 August 2023 GMT

Where:
Salesforce connector in GCP environment

Estimated Duration:
Up to 30 minutes

Impact:
Here's what you can expect during the period we're upgrading the Salesforce Connector:

● Data synchronization from Salesforce to Reltio will continue without interruption.
● Data synchronization from Reltio to Salesforce will remain in the Reltio queue. When the upgrade is complete, the connector will resume synchronizing the paused data. No data will be lost during this process.
● Salesforce Connector configurations will not be available for you to modify any connector mappings, credentials, or other settings. APIs/services such as monitoring and status will remain available.
● We recommend that you not use the Tasks APIs to perform any bulk data loads between Salesforce and Reltio until we notify you that the upgrade is complete.

If you have any questions regarding this update, please contact Reltio Support.

item.title: Planned, Disruption-free Maintenance of the Reltio data storage subsystem on 2023/06/17
item.content:encoded:
Jun 19, 00:00 PDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 17, 00:00 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 16, 14:34 PDT
Scheduled - What?
Reltio Technical Operations Team will be performing disruption-free maintenance of the data storage subsystem underlying several production and test environments, starting today, Saturday, June 17th, 2023 @ 12 am PST

When?
Saturday, June 17th, 2023 @ 12 am PST to Monday, June 19th 2023 @ 12am PST

Where?

Reltio Google Cloud environment prod-usg.reltio.com

Estimated Duration:
Full maintenance of all planned clusters will take up to 48 hours

Any disruption or other impact expected ?
This maintenance will not cause any impact on any of the existing platform tenants or functions.
Maintenance will be done in a fully disruption-free mode. No impact is expected on the performance of any tenants or operations on these environments

Any actions expected from Reltio users ?
No actions expected or required. Just keep working with Reltio Platform as usual.

If you have any questions regarding this update, please contact Reltio Support.
